definition: (interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin

sentences.english: This paper presents a curve-fitting method to construct Hash functions.
sentences.chinese: 本文給出一種構造哈希函數的曲線擬合法。

sentences.english: Class to perform a modulo operation on the hash code returned by the.
sentences.chinese: 方法返回的哈希代碼執行求模操作。

sentences.english: Digital signatures and hash algorithms are mechanisms used to provide data integrity.
sentences.chinese: 數據簽名和哈希算法是用於提供數據完整性的機制。

sentences.english: Often the hash function involves using the modulo operator with the table size.
sentences.chinese: 通常，哈希函數包含對數組容量的取模操作。

sentences.english: The MD4 algorithm is used three times in order to produce the NT hash.
sentences.chinese: MD4算法需要使用三次，這樣才能產生NT哈希。

sentences.english: You can use standard password recovery control with hashed passwords.
sentences.chinese: 你可以使用標準的密碼哈希密碼恢復控制。

sentences.english: Constructs a new, empty hashtable with the specified initial capacity and the specified load factor.
sentences.chinese: 構建一個新的指定初始容量和裝載因子的空哈希表。

sentences.english: This class builds a hash table of key-value pairs at the class instantiation.
sentences.chinese: 此類在類實例化時構建一個鍵值對哈希表。

sentences.english: Half of the input is sent to each hash function.
sentences.chinese: 對每個哈希函數發送一半的輸入。

sentences.english: Encode the hashed byte array into hex characters.
sentences.chinese: 將哈希後的字節數組編碼成十六進制字符。

sentences.english: Switched from CRC to MD5 hashes for stronger per-file validation.
sentences.chinese: 從交換的華潤爲MD5哈希更有力的每個文件的驗證。

sentences.english: Hashed passwords are more secure than encrypted passwords because they can't be decrypted.
sentences.chinese: 哈希密碼比加密密碼更安全，因爲無法對其進行解密。

sentences.english: If the hash table already contains the key then the old value is overwritten.
sentences.chinese: 如果哈希表已包含的關鍵則是覆蓋舊值。

sentences.english: I think in Jordan the Hashemite monarchy has a lot of good will.
sentences.chinese: 我在約旦哈希姆君主制覺得有很多良好的意願。

sentences.english: Consider memory retiring to implement per-chain hash-table locks.
sentences.chinese: 考慮用內存“退休”法來實現哈希表的按桶加鎖。
